channel.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
channel.description:
Hello, I'm interested to do a EasyRSC client size bigger / larger, I've tried to investigate it at forum but, it doesnt contain full info or posts too old to reply to them. So what should I do to have customized client with custom (800x600 for example) resolution and do it without pointer and interface problem in it? I've tried to modify existing clients but then it doesnt seems to be ok (and not working afterwards).
Will be very kind if you help me, it would be next step for EasyRSC client develepoment.

item.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

[quote=“adu”]All you have to do is align everything[/quote] yep ill do that

Read full topic
item.source: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question

item.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

All you have to do is align everything based on windowWidth and windowHeight instead of using integers to make it fit.

Read full topic
item.source: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question

item.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
item.dc:creator: @forgez forgez
item.description:
@forgez wrote:

dimebagx:

Yeah, you should be right, RSCE is the only resizable client i’ve seen, Im sure RSCA had it before that though

RSCA had it, but they realize is on their platform I understand why, but really I do not understand why its not acutally relized like a EasyRSC client with added in client. So any suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question

item.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
item.dc:creator: @dimebagx dimebagx
item.description:
@dimebagx wrote:

Yeah, you should be right, RSCE is the only resizable client i’ve seen, Im sure RSCA had it before that though

item.source: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question

item.title: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
item.dc:creator: @forgez forgez
item.description:
@forgez wrote:

dimebagx:

look for the width and height variables, but im pretty sure it’s a big job, and you have to re-align everything

Ok, but I saw a lot private RSC servers have large and custom clients at all. they made it somehow. I saw that I need to add height and weight parameters in config.java, mudclass.java and add 2 lines to settings.ini, also need to modify files to align normal pointers and interface.

Maybe here is already some client prepared for this?

Read full topic
item.source: Client Size / Resolution / Width & Height question
